description: Creates a connection to a shell.

properties.name: routername
properties.label: Router Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the router where the shell is located. The local rrouter is used if not specified.

properties.name: flowname
properties.label: Flow Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the flow that provides the shell.

properties.name: shellname
properties.label: Shell Name
properties.description: Provide the name of the shell.
